Subject: Invitation to discuss breakthrough cancer immunotherapy on "On the Frontline" – Hosted by Dr. Maya Patel

Dear Dr. Chen,

I hope you’re doing well. My name is Dr. Maya Patel, host of the "On the Frontline" podcast, where we explore cutting‑edge advances in medical science with the leaders shaping them.

We are preparing an upcoming episode titled **"Breakthroughs in Cancer Immunotherapy: From CAR‑T to Next‑Gen Strategies"**. Given your seminal work on CAR‑T cell therapy for solid tumors, highlighted in your 2023 NEJM paper, we believe your insights would be incredibly valuable to our listeners, many of whom are clinicians, researchers, and patient‑advocates eager to learn about the latest translational breakthroughs.

Would you be available for a 30‑minute interview in the next two weeks? We can accommodate your schedule and conduct the conversation remotely via Zoom or any platform you prefer.

Thank you for considering our invitation. I’m happy to provide any additional details you may need.

Warm regards,
Dr. Maya Patel
Host, "On the Frontline" Podcast
m.patel@frontlinepodcast.com

Here’s the draft email to Dr. Emily Chen. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if you’d prefer to reach out to the second‑ranked candidate, Dr. Aisha Rahman, instead.

*If you’re ready, I can also handle sending the email and schedule a calendar invite once you confirm.*
